title: Cap Crown, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap crown of Point d'Angleterre à réseau with a central design of flowers in a vase, symmetrically framed by floral sprays and cartouches.
